SELECT temp.repay_date, ( SUM(temp.interest) + SUM(temp.corpus) + SUM(temp.default_interest) ) AS total_amount FROM (
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.`actual_repay_date`, '%Y-%m') AS repay_date, SUM(m.`actual_interest`) AS interest, SUM(m.`corpus`) AS corpus, SUM(m.`default_interest`) AS default_interest FROM loan_repay m WHERE m.`status` = 'COMPLETE' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(m.`actual_repay_date`, '%Y-%m')
UNION ALL
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.`repay_date`, '%Y-%m') AS repay_date, SUM(m.`expected_interest`) AS interest, SUM(m.`corpus`) AS corpus, SUM(m.`default_interest`) AS default_interest FROM loan_repay m WHERE m.`status` != 'COMPLETE' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(m.`repay_date`, '%Y-%m')
) temp GROUP BY temp.repay_date ORDER BY temp.repay_date

SELECT l.`repay_date` AS expert_repay_date, IF( l.`status` = 'COMPLETE', l.`repay_amount`, l.`corpus` + l.`expected_interest` + l.`default_interest` ) AS repay_amount, t.`name` AS loan_name, t.`id` AS loan_id, t.`agent_login_name` AS login_name, l.`status`, l.`actual_repay_date` FROM loan_repay l JOIN loan t ON l.`loan_id` = t.`id` AND t.`status` IN ('REPAYING', 'COMPLETE', 'OVERDUE') WHERE DATE_FORMAT(l.`repay_date`, '%Y-%m') = #{date}
AND l.`status` = 'COMPLETE'
AND l.`status` != 'COMPLETE'
ORDER BY l.`repay_date`
